body_html:
So, I do remember being the one who suggested that you just add a lock, but looking again at the method you added the lock to, I am actually not convinced it is not called all that often; there are certainly a decent number of call sites.

Can you run the experiment detailed https://fb.facebook.com/groups/101100140348621/permalink/536806433444654/ to see how many times name() is called in prod?
body_text:
So, I do remember being the one who suggested that you just add a lock, but looking again at the method you added the lock to, I am actually not convinced it is not called all that often; there are certainly a decent number of call sites.
Can you run the experiment detailed https://fb.facebook.com/groups/101100140348621/permalink/536806433444654/ to see how many times name() is called in prod?
body:
So, I do remember being the one who suggested that you just add a lock, but looking again at the method you added the lock to, I am actually not convinced it is not called all that often; there are certainly a decent number of call sites.

Can you run the experiment detailed https://fb.facebook.com/groups/101100140348621/permalink/536806433444654/ to see how many times name() is called in prod?
